name: manifest-frontend-examples
description: Example frontend implementation with Manifest. Based on the TodoMVC project.

scripts.dev-angular: concurrently "npm run manifest" "cd examples/angular && npm run dev"
scripts.dev-svelte: concurrently "npm run manifest" "cd examples/svelte && npm run dev"
scripts.dev-javascript-es6: concurrently "npm run manifest" "cd examples/javascript-es6 && npm run dev"
